/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the horizon, adding a touch of natural beauty to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
